definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
clown/2nd earthly branch: 1-3 a.m., 12th solar month (6th January to 3rd February), year of the Ox/ancient Chinese compass point: 30°

sentences.english: Virtue may not always make a face handsome, but vice will certainly make it ugly.
sentences.chinese: 美德不一定能使容貌变美，邪念却必然令人变丑。

sentences.english: Never laughing can help keep your appearance from wrinkling and getting uglier .
sentences.chinese: 永远不笑可以帮助保持容颜，阻止皱纹的产生和变丑。

sentences.english: Because I adhere to the perfect note, do not want a laissez-faire ugly feet.
sentences.chinese: 因为我恪守着完美注意，不愿意放任双足变丑。

definition: clown/2nd earthly branch: 1-3 a.m., 12th solar month (6th January to 3rd February), year of the Ox/ancient Chinese compass point: 30°
lit. a girl changes eighteen times between childhood and womanhood (idiom)/fig. a young woman is very different from the little girl she once was
to put on weight/to get fat
out of shape/to lose shape/to deform
to disfigure/to spoil the beauty of
